predicate.note: Frames file for 'lace' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.4, Framenet entry Closure.

example.name: fingers
example.text: John laced his fingers and stared Mary in the eye.

example.name: passive
example.text: Final approval came on a simple voice vote in the Senate, and the swift passage contrasted with months of negotiations over the underlying bill which [*T*-2] is laced with special-interest provisions for both members and the executive branch.
example.arg: special-interest provisions for both members and the executive branch
